title: 4 WEEK WORKOUT OR DIET PLAN

review.name: Tony Stark
review.details: He understood my needs and came up with a plan for it. I am really satisfied and will probably return to him in the future!

review.details: He is a quick and responsive seller! He created a meal plan that is perfect for my lifestyle as a student.

review.name: Salman Khan
review.details: I would definitely recommend him to anyone who is looking for some nutritional & diet plan ideas.

title: 8 WEEK WORKOUT & DIET PLAN

review.name: Evan Enzo
review.details: Great work for the price in an easy to use format with all the information you could need.

title: 10 X 30SEC WORKOUT EXERCISE VIDEOS
description: Ten 30-seconds clips of a popular fitness exercise. All of the exercises included in the Basic Plan plus the following: Burpees, Mountain Climbers, Russian Twists, Sit Ups, Tricep Dips,  Push Ups, Glute Bridge, Reverse Lunges, Reverse Lunges, Bodyweight Squats.

review.name: Gavin Grayson
review.details: Really great, broke everything down well. Thank you, fantastic value.

title: 20 X 30SEC WORKOUT EXERCISE VIDEOS
description: Twenty 30-seconds clips of a popular fitness exercise. All of the exercises included in the Basic Plan plus the following:  Froggers, Heal Touches, Scissor Kicks, Side Planks,  Commando Planks, Donkey Kicks, Curtsy Lunges, Side lunges, Sumo Squats.

review.name: Jaxon Jordan
review.details: Very professional, great communication, super recommended!

review.name: Rocky Handsome
review.details: Really nice seller and highly knowledgeable!

title: 30 X 30SEC WORKOUT EXERCISE VIDEOS
description: Thirty 30-seconds clips of a popular fitness exercise. All of the exercises included in the Basic Plan plus the following: Dead Bugs, Bicycles, Toe Touch Crunches, Cross Body Tabletops, Cross Body Tabletops, V Ups,  Kick Throughs, Glute Kickbacks, Jump Lunges,  Sumo Squat Pulses, Jump Squats.

review.name: Dustin Wood
review.details: Excellent workout. Looking forward to be making some progress with my current weight.
